function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular training and reinforcement of health and safety protocols, strict monitoring of adherence to protocols, and encouraging a culture of responsibility for maintaining a safe and healthy environment","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing technology, and sanitation automation systems","People":"Employees, guests, and visitors of the resort","Owner":"Resort management and HR team"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of employee initiatives and strategic plans on disease transmission risk within the built environment","Impact":"Unintentional increase in the risk of contagious disease transmission due to oversight of factors related to employee engagement initiatives and strategic plans","Mitigation":"Conducting a risk assessment of proposed initiatives and plans to identify potential impacts on disease transmission risk, integrating health and safety considerations into strategic planning, and consulting with health experts","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, data analytics for impact evaluation, and collaboration platforms for expert consultation","People":"Resort management, HR team, employees, and guests","Owner":"Resort management and HR team"},{"Description":"Lack of alignment between employee engagement initiatives and health and safety protocols, leading to a compromised environment for disease transmission control","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious disease spread due to conflicting priorities and practices within the resort environment","Mitigation":"Integration of health and safety considerations into employee engagement initiatives, regular review of initiatives for alignment with health protocols, and clear communication of expectations regarding disease control measures","Technologies":"Integration platforms for health and safety protocols, communication and collaboration tools for streamlined messaging, and training platforms for educating employees on disease control measures","People":"Resort management, HR team, employees, and guests","Owner":"Resort management and HR team"}]}
